headline: International Paper Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: International Paper (NYSE: IP; LSE: IPC) today declared a quarterly dividend of $0.4625 per share for the period from January 1, 2026 to March 31, 2026, inclusive, on the common stock, par value $1.00, of the Company, payable on March 17, 2026, to holders of record at the close of business on February 23, 2026.
